publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-662 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Approval of Rateable Values SSIs—That the Parliament agrees that the following be approved: the draft Train Operating Companies (Rateable Values) (Scotland) Order 2000; the draft Railtrack plc (Rateable Values) (Scotland) Order 2000; the draft Water Undertakings (Rateable Values) (Scotland) Order 2000; the draft BG Transco plc (Rateable Values) (Scotland) Order 2000; the draft Electricity Generators (Rateable Values) (Scotland) Order 2000 the draft Electricity Generators (Aluminium) (Rateable Values) (Scotland) Order 2000; and the draft Electricity Lands (Rateable Values) (Scotland) Order 2000.
